changes.new: We advertise our own products and services on non-Meta ad platforms. We use marketing vendors to deliver these ads. If we use your activity on our Products to tailor these ads, you can opt out of this type of use.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: A third party that creates reports to help advertisers understand how their content and ads are performing. These reports also measure whether people took an action after seeing an ad.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: How do we collect or receive this information from partners?

changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: A person, business, organization or body that provides services to Meta or to our users on behalf of Meta. For example, our service providers do things like investigate suspicious activity and provide customer support.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: Just like you need a mailing address to receive a letter from a friend, your device needs an IP address to receive information on the internet.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics (e.g., interactions, pages visited, search terms, click activity, or location) which may be used for personalisation or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking/analytics. Consider disabling personalised ads, restricting cookies, or using privacy tools if concerned about behavioural profiling.

changes.new: Information about the network you connect your device to, including your IP address
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics (e.g., interactions, pages visited, search terms, click activity, or location) which may be used for personalisation or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking/analytics. Consider disabling personalised ads, restricting cookies, or using privacy tools if concerned about behavioural profiling.

changes.new: You can use the Digital Advertising Alliance industry opt-out platform on your web browser. If you live in Canada, you can use the Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada industry opt-out platform. Certain ad blockers and tools to restrict cookies can interfere with your ability to opt out.
changes.explanation: The updated policy introduces or expands the purposes for which your data is used (e.g., advertising, analytics, research, or security) or clarifies the legal basis for processing.
changes.suggested_action: Check whether you are comfortable with these purposes and, where applicable, adjust your consent or opt-out preferences.

changes.new: Information we collect about contacts and connections
changes.explanation: The policy indicates that additional types of personal or usage data are now collected, including: contacts.
changes.suggested_action: Review whether you are comfortable with these new types of data being collected. If not, adjust your privacy settings or limit the information you provide.
